Languages: Understand Common and Deep Speech but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Mimicry
Traits.Content: The Echoling can mimic voices and sounds it has heard, including speech. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Traits.Name: Evasive Movement
Traits.Content: The Echoling can move through spaces occupied by creatures of the same size or larger without provoking opportunity attacks.

Actions.Name: Erroneous Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 2 (1d4) psychic damage. The Echoling slashes with its jagged limbs, the eerie whispers echoing in the air, disorienting its foe.

Actions.Name: Confounding Echo
Actions.Content: Targeted Effect: The Echoling targets one enemy. If the target fails a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, it is confused for 1 minute as it hears disembodied voices, causing it to be unable to determine friend from foe. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
